post.text: Election Day is in one weekâ€”and once it's over, it can't be redone. Is everyone you know voting? RT this. hillaryclinton.com/makeaplan

comment.author: Chance
comment.text: Exposing Hillary's corruption is just beginning. The FBI has more than is commonly known. The 30,000 'deleted' emails is nothing. They have those and lot more that could bring down the democrat party from the president on down. This is going to be fun to watch. :)

replies.author: Robert
replies.text: you wont be laughing when Putton is running this democracy. He is already Trumps Leader of Foreign affairs! You'll see

replies.author: Chance
replies.text: Who's Putton? Sounds like you haven't heard of the backup system and 'drive' the FBI has had for months and didn't bother checking out. This drive has EVERYTHING on it. From video to telephone voice recordings to emails. Everything that touched Hillary's 'private' server... from the president on down. Including classified documents as a few have already been discovered. You might wanna work on that bad case of denial and delusion you seem to have.
